feature1.explanation: Both texts use quotation marks and hyphens similarly, indicating a consistent punctuation style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar level of lexical variation and word choice, using similar vocabulary and expressions.

feature3.explanation: Both texts show consistency in sentence structure and length, with a focus on direct and concise expressions.

feature4.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar tone and mood, showing a critical and opinionated style.

feature5.explanation: There are no spelling or typographical errors present in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, the likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author is high.
